description: Foreword for Reviewers There is an ongoing discussion on the PSS category, as some of the PSS sections have been moved to other categories:  PSS-01 and PSS-03 have been moved to DOC;  PSS-02 has been moved to DEV;  PSS-05, PSS-07, PSS-08 and PSS-09 have been integrated into IAM; and  PSS-11 has been moved to CO. For the objectives and requirements listed below, the question remains open. The original C5 numbers have been kept for clarity Ref
assurance_high: The CSP shall automatically monitor the accesses performed by or on behalf of investigators

assurance_substantial: If inactivity is detected by time measurement, the time interval shall be configurable by the CSP or – if technically possible – by the CSC

assurance_high: All CSP commitments regarding locations of data processing and storage shall be enforced
